actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on 1,4-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2-{{1-{{(2,3-di-hydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)amino carbonyl}-2-oxopropyl}azo}-,dimethyl ester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on 1,4- benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2-((1-(((2,3-di-hydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol- 5-yl)amino carbonyl)-2-oxopropyl)azo)-, dimethyl ester.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on 1,4-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2-{{1-{{(2,3-di-hydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)amino carbonyl}-2-oxopropyl}azo}-,dimethyl ester.
